name: GPT-RAG (Azure)
description: [项目级] Sharing the learning along the way we been gathering to enable Azure OpenAI at enterprise scale in a secure manner. GPT-RAG core is a Retrieval-Augmented Generation pattern running in Azure, using Azure Cognitive Search for retrieval and Azure OpenAI large language models to power ChatGPT-style and Q&A experiences.。来源: https://github.com/Azure/GPT-RAG

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Sharing the learning along the way we been gathering to enable Azure OpenAI at enterprise scale in a secure manner. GPT-RAG core is a Retrieval-Augmented Generation pattern running in Azure, using Azure Cognitive Search for retrieval and Azure OpenAI large language models to power ChatGPT-style and Q&A experiences.

来源: https://github.com/Azure/GPT-RAG
语言: Bicep
Stars: 1133
